comments:
Steps to reproduce:
1.Deploy birt on weblogic 9
2.Visit index.jsp
3.Preview test.rptdesign

Expected result:
Report can be previewd

Actual result:
Error 500--Internal Server Error 
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError
	at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)

Could we add apache common-logging-api.jar into WEB-INF/lib? Any problem?

There will be conficts if we package this jar into runtime package.
So uses need to copy apache common-logging-api.jar manually be themselves if they want to deploy on weblogic.
It works after adding apache common-logging-api.jar into WEB-INF/lib
